item.description: Overview Type:TVEpisodes:UnknownStatus: Not yet airedAired:Not availablePremiered: UnknownBroadcast:UnknownProducers:ShueishaLicensors: NoneStudios:UnknownSource:MangaGenres:Action, Adventure, Comedy, Super Power, Supernatural, ShounenDuration:UnknownRating:PG-13 - Teens 13 or older[Source:MAL] Trailer .video-container { position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; } .video-container iframe { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } *MyAnimeList | *Anilist | *Fandom Synopsis The new season of Bleach will accustom the final manga arc known as Sennen Kessen-hen (Thousand-Year Blood War Arc), which traverses from the 55th to the 74th volume of the manga.
